name: less-loader
description: Less loader for webpack. Compiles Less to CSS.

3.0.0.name: less-loader
3.0.0.description: Less loader for webpack. Compiles Less to CSS.

4.0.0.name: less-loader
4.0.0.description: Less loader for webpack. Compiles Less to CSS.

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel -s true src -d dist --ignore 'src/**/*.test.js'
scripts.travis:lint: yarn run lint && yarn run security
